XI.iii.1.C.5.b
.
Election of VA or Service Department Benefits
If a claimant is eligible for payment of burial benefits from both VA and a military service department, then a choice must be made between the two because only one benefit is payable.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C  - Burial Authorization Payment Issues
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
